data.title: MediaCenter
data.text:
KFUPM Students Achieve Historic First Place in Global Drone Competition

Saudi Press Agency

June 27, 2024, 7 p.m.

King Fahd University of Petroleum and Minerals (KFUPM) has secured first place in the prestigious Student Unmanned Aerial Systems (SUAS 2024) competition held in Maryland, USA.

Read more..

Saudi and Qatari universities lead the region in global education rankings

The National

June 5, 2024, 7 p.m.

King Fahd University of Petroleum and Minerals led the way in 101st position – up from 180th last year – out of 1,500 universities worldwide.

Read more..

UK - Saudi research explores how AI can drive sustainability.

Northumbria University Newcastle
